Title: toISOYear
Description: Converts a date, or date with time, to the ISO year as a UInt16 number.
value — The value with date or date with time. Date, Date32, DateTime or DateTime64
The input value converted to a ISO year number. UInt16.
Examples: SELECT  toISOYear(toDate('2024/10/02')) as year1,  toISOYear(toDateTime('2024-10-02 01:30:00')) as year2
